name: M. Heroes
author: Sam36return
notes: This month was pretty easy, I felt that I needed the divine wraths in this meta to deal with Sylvans which despite running triple chalice was the toughest match up. Cosmic cyclone is also a great pick for the deck to trigger destiny calling, but the ladder is full of fish and sylvan so better to focus on negating effects. Anki direct attack + chalice for 3200 was an MVP
